transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Yeah hi sir good morning.
Customer: Hi good morning.
Executive: Sir main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi baaki sab theek hai aapke?
Customer: Kya naam hai aapka?
Executive: So Suchi baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Okay Suchi hi.
Executive: Kaise hai sir kya ho payega abhi?
Customer: Haan ji bataiye na.
Executive: Ji sir service ke regarding connect kiya tha sir abhi hamara service vagaira chal raha hai buyleads vagaira pe abhi kya feedback hai sir hamara buyleads bahut hi matlab kam consume ho rahi hai to koi issue?
Customer: A actually sab divide ho chuka hai na is vajah se koi properly us pe dhyan nahi de pa raha hai aur ek dusra
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Jo leads aa rahi hai na wo retail leads jyada aa rahi hai to do tyre char tyre ki leads wo hame nahi chahiye actually bulk wali leads chahiye.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: To wo kam aa rahi hai aur wo jo leads aa rahi hai bulk wali wo bahut dur se aa rahi hai.
Executive: Aapko kaha ka chahiye sir ek baar?
Customer: Matlab bangalore vagaira se aa rahi hai abhi bangalore vagaira to bahut dur ho jayega na uska transportation vagaira set karne jayenge na to rate mein usko waha se lega to sasta pad jayega aisa ho jayega fir mere ko gujarat se jitna lead jyada cover ho jaye utna better hai.
Executive: Haan sirf gujarat kahi focus kar rahe ho sir?
Customer: Haan gujarat se matlab rajasthan ho gujarat ho lekin bulk ho to thoda badhiya rah jayega.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Haan aur main kya bol raha hu Suchi aapne wo dala tha kya VM fix wala?
Executive: Haan sir wo aapki photos vagaira bheji gayi hai matlab details share ki gayi thi but usme aapne photos nahi share kiye hai hum log ko baaki sari cheeze ho gayi hai usme photos nahi share hui hai VM fix silver
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Matlab jaise aap wo photo photo mein na arrange karwata hu aapko.
Executive: Ek baar wo batati hu sir jaise sir ne na kya kiya hai PDF share kiya hai hame.
Customer: Haan PDF maine share kiya hai haan.
Executive: Us PDF mein kya hai sir ki usme sara ye mention hai matlab maan lo aap ki uska detail vagaira mention hai product ka detail mention hai but usme na koi photo nahi mention hai aap samajh rahe ho?
Customer: Wo photo hum drop karke nahi screenshot leke nahi nikal sakte kya usme se?
Executive: Sir fir wo dal nahi payega na uska jo hame wo chahiye rahega matlab hamare yaha jo photos upload hoti hai uska ek size fix rehta hai 1000 cross 1000 ka hi dimension hota hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Right to wo 1000 cross 1000 ka jo dimension nahi hoga to wo fir yaha pe aapko na uske points milenge na kuch milega to wo aise upload karne ka to koi matlab hai nahi aur isme matlab jaise jo VM fix silver type one one le lu main
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: C2 bhi le lu C3 bhi le lu aise hi matlab type three type four aise hi karke in products ke naam hai but in products
Customer: Product ka naam platinum aise likha hua hai wo matlab jo content matlab jitna aata hai na matlab grade jitna aata hai
Executive: Sir wahi cheez humne copy paste kari hai jaise pehla ek product hai aapka VM fix silver type one C1.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Fir hai aapka VM fix gold type two CI8 CI plus C1 C aise hi VM fix platinum type three C2 T3 aise karke aapke products ke naam likhe hai but the main thing is sir jo isme
Customer: Product ka naam niche platinum gold silver hai na wo product ka naam hai actually wo grade hai actually type one type two wala.
Executive: To mujhe kya add karna rahega sir matlab main yahi main to ye pura aapka type karungi na matlab aap kya chahte ho main kya type karu keval?
Customer: Aap jo bhi karte ho sahi karte ho just naam jo hai uska ye platinum hai platinum ke side mein aap type likh dena ki type one type two aur side mein na C2 T1 jaise grade hai na waise dal dena hai bas.
Executive: Haan sir main to yahi kar rahi thi sir gold matlab jo aap naam bata rahe ho na usi ke according main dal rahi hu but ye hai ki sir usme uska product ka price bhi nahi mention hai to mujhe ye aapko mere sath matlab
Customer: Price main aapko na share karta hu aur dusra main aapko na photographs iske back ke aapko bhi share kar deta hu.
Executive: Ek baar sir aap apna matlab abhi jabhi bhi matlab thoda bhi free ho na
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek baar sir aap catalog kholo ek baar catalog khol ke dekho usme jo bhi aapko lag raha ho ki matlab abhi change hona hai ya cheeze thik honi hai usme aap mujhe ek baar batao
Customer: Thik hai main right I will
Executive: Ek ek ek kaam karu thoda time de do mujhe 15-20 minute ek jagah pe baitha hu to properly baat nahi ho pa rahi.
Customer: Thik hai sir thoda jyada ho jayega.
Executive: Nahi actually kyuki aapke catalog pe kaam ho hi raha hai to maine socha ek baar kar lu but ek baar aap dekh lo thik hai koi issue nahi ek baar aap dekh lo.
Customer: Photo aap share kar dena.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Aap kar lo fir mere ko ek baar call kar lena.
Customer: Choti yaar.
Customer: Mujhe main karta hu 10-15 minute mein call back karta hu.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Done done okay bye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads consumption is low.

- Receiving more retail leads, wants bulk leads.

- Bulk leads are coming from distant locations.

- Photos missing in VM fix details.

- Product price not mentioned in catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to share price details.

- Executive assured to share product photographs.

- Executive asked customer to review catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 15-20 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, leads, catalog, vm fix, product details
